resources.string: There was an error, please try again later or reach the developer for assistance.
Ecoogo wasn\'t able to get the data from all the different experiences it has to offer. Please check your internet connection, and if the problem persists, contact the developer.
Couldn\'t get data from our servers
Ecoogo was unable to get data from all of the experiences it has to offer. Reach the developer for assistance.
We aren\'t allowed to access your location!
You didn\'t allow Ecoogo to access your location. The app will still work fine, but you\'ll get a better experience if you grant us the permission.
Your location is disabled! If you enable it Ecoogo will be able to provide you a better experience.
Ecoogo works better with your location
In order to provide you the best experience, please enable GPS and location access
